means: family ： 指构成一个家庭的全体成员，与家里的房子无关。
home ： 侧重人们生长或长期居住或组织家庭的地方或房子，含感情色彩。
house ： 指家里人居住的房屋，不带感情色彩。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"居住处"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: house, building, dwelling, shelter, habitation, home, residence
means: house ： 中性词，泛指一切供居住的建筑物，尤指适合一家一户居住的房屋。
building ： 泛指一切建筑物，不限于居住的房子。
dwelling ： 正式用词，仅指人们居住的任何建筑物。
shelter ： 可指长期或临时的住处，也指简陋或临时搭建的躲避风雨的场所。
habitation ： 指长久或固定的住所或居住地。
home ： 指永久住家时，带有家庭所特有的温暖、情感等气息。
residence ： 指大而堂皇的寓所或公馆，也指法律上的居住点。

lj.lj_ls: 有些人卖掉自己的房子，坐在船上写书。

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)a group or organization weakened by internal dissensions will be unable to withstand external pressures
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)开裂的房屋撑不了多久；内部纷争，外患无穷

jx.jx_en_mean: a structure built out of playing cards precariously balanced together
jx.jx_cn_mean: （为打牌而建的不稳固的房屋）牌房

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)secure the presence of enough members for a quorum in the House of Commons
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英)（下议院）有足够的法定人数出席

jx.jx_en_mean: do the cooking, cleaning, and other tasks involved in the running of a household
(of a child) play at being a family in its home

phrase.cizu_name: put (或set 或get) one's house in order

lj.lj_ly: the Americans need to get their own economic house in order.
lj.lj_ls: 美国人需要对自己的经济做必要的改革。

jx.jx_en_mean: make one's home in a specified place

phrase.cizu_name: like a house on fire 或 like a house afire 【非正式用语】

lj.lj_ly: ran away like a house on fire; tickets that sold like a house afire.
lj.lj_ls: 匆忙逃跑；电影票顷刻间销售一空

jx.jx_en_mean: At the expense of the establishment; free
jx.jx_cn_mean: 由设立的机构出资的；免费的

lj.lj_ly: food and drinks on the house.

entry.def: A house is a building in which people live, usually the people belonging to one family.

example.ex: She has moved to a smaller house.
example.tran: 她已经搬进了一所小一些的房子。

example.ex: ...her parents' house in Warwickshire.
example.tran: 她父母位于沃里克郡的住宅

entry.def: You can refer to all the people who live together in a house as the house .
entry.tran: 住在一幢房子里的人;一家人

example.ex: If he set his alarm clock for midnight, it would wake the whole house...
example.tran: 如果他把闹钟设在午夜响，那会把全家人都吵醒的。

example.ex: So I grew up with that feeling that the man is the head of the house.
example.tran: 因此我从小到大一直认为男人是一家之主。

entry.def: House is used in the names of types of places where people go to eat and drink.
entry.tran: （用于餐饮场所的名称）餐厅，馆，屋

example.ex: ...a steak house.
example.tran: 牛排餐厅

example.ex: ...an old Salzburg coffee house.
example.tran: 年代久远的萨尔茨堡咖啡馆

entry.def: House is used in the names of types of companies, especially ones which publish books, lend money, or design clothes.
entry.tran: （尤用于出版、借贷或服装设计等公司的名称）公司，商行

example.ex: Many of the clothes come from the world's top fashion houses...
example.tran: 这些服装中有很多出自世界顶级时装设计公司。

example.ex: Eventually she was fired from her job at a publishing house.
example.tran: 最后她就职的那家出版社把她解雇了。

entry.def: House is sometimes used in the names of office buildings and large private homes or expensive houses.
entry.tran: （用于办公楼、私宅或豪宅名称）大楼，大厦，大宅

example.ex: I was to go to the very top floor of Bush House in Aldwych.
example.tran: 我正要去奥尔德威治的布什大厦最顶层。

example.ex: ...Harewood House near Leeds.
example.tran: 利兹附近的哈伍德宫

entry.def: You can refer to the two main bodies of Britain's parliament and the United States of America's legislature as the House or a House.
entry.tran: （英国）上（或下）议院；（美国）众议院

example.ex: Some members of the House and Senate worked all day yesterday...
example.tran: 一些众议员和参议员昨天工作了整整一天。

example.ex: The Republicans have majorities in both Houses.
example.tran: 共和党人在参众两院都占了多数席位。

entry.def: You can refer to all the people at a debate as the house .

example.ex: The club is planning a public debate on 'This house believes that journalism has not gained from the introduction of new technology'.
example.tran: 该俱乐部拟就“我方辩手认为新闻报道并没有从新技术中获益”一题进行一次公开辩论。

entry.def: In a British school, a house is a group of children of different ages who compete against other groups in sports and other activities. Each house usually has a name.
entry.tran: （英国学校中为进行体育竞赛等所划分的）组，社

example.ex: He was a prefect and house captain.
example.tran: 他是班长兼社长。

entry.def: A house is a family which has been or will be important for many generations, especially the family of a king or queen.
entry.tran: 贵族;名门望族；（尤指）王室，王族

example.ex: ...the Saudi Royal House.
example.tran: 沙特王族

example.ex: ...the House of Windsor.
example.tran: 温莎王室

entry.def: The house is the part of a theatre, cinema, or other place of entertainment where the audience sits. You can also refer to the audience at a particular performance as the house.
entry.tran: （剧场、影院或其他娱乐场所的）观众席;全体观众

example.ex: They played in front of a packed house.
example.tran: 他们的演出座无虚席。

entry.def: A restaurant's house wine is the cheapest wine it sells, which is not listed by name on the wine list.
entry.tran: （餐馆里的葡萄酒）廉价佐餐的，未列入酒水单的

example.ex: Tweed ordered a carafe of the house wine.
example.tran: 特威德点了一瓶佐餐葡萄酒。

example.ex: ...a bottle of house red or white.
example.tran: 一瓶普通红葡萄酒或白葡萄酒

entry.def: To house someone means to provide a house or flat for them to live in.

example.ex: Part III of the Housing Act 1985 imposes duties on local authorities to house homeless people...
example.tran: 1985年《住房法案》的第三部分要求地方政府为无家可归者提供住所。

example.ex: Regrettably we have to house families in these inadequate flats.
example.tran: 很遗憾，我们不得不让住户挤在这些狭小的公寓里。

entry.def: A building or container that houses something is the place where it is located or from where it operates.

example.ex: The château itself is open to the public and houses a museum of motorcycles and cars...
example.tran: 古堡本身对公众开放，并设有一个摩托车和汽车博物馆。

example.ex: Many years later, the temple erected in her name was used to house the Roman mint.
example.tran: 多年后，以她的名义建造的寺庙被改造成了罗马铸币厂。

entry.def: If you say that a building houses a number of people, you mean that is the place where they live or where they are staying.

example.ex: The building will house twelve boys and eight girls...
example.tran: 这座房子里会住12个男孩和8个女孩。

example.ex: Their villas housed army officers now.
example.tran: 他们的别墅里现在住着军官。

entry.def: If a person or their performance or speech brings the house down, the audience claps, laughs, or shouts loudly because the performance or speech is very impressive or amusing.
entry.tran: (人、表演或演讲）博得全场喝彩，引得哄堂大笑

example.ex: It's really an amazing dance. It just always brings the house down.
example.tran: 这真是一段精彩绝伦的舞蹈表演，每次总是博得全场喝彩。

entry.def: If two people get on like a house on fire, they quickly become close friends, for example because they have many interests in common.
entry.tran: 很快就打得火热;一见如故;一拍即合

entry.def: If you keep house, you do the cleaning and cooking for your household, and do not go out to work.
entry.tran: （不出去工作而）操持家务，当家

example.ex: He lives with an aunt who keeps house for him.
example.tran: 他和一位帮他料理家务的姑妈住在一起。

entry.def: If you are given something in a restaurant or bar on the house, you do not have to pay for it.

example.ex: The owner knew about the engagement and brought them glasses of champagne on the house.
example.tran: 店主知道了订婚一事，于是免费请他们喝香槟。

entry.def: If someone gets their house in order ,puts their house in order, or sets their house in order, they arrange their affairs and solve their problems.
entry.tran: 管好自己的事;处理好自身问题

example.ex: Some think Stempel's departure will help the company get its financial house in order...
example.tran: 有些人认为斯坦普尔的离职将有助于公司解决自身的财务问题。

example.ex: The challenge for American leadership is this: Can we put our economic house in order?...
example.tran: 美国领导层面临的挑战是：我们能否处理好自己的经济问题？

means.word_mean: 1. a dwelling that serves as living quarters for one or more families;

sentences.sentence: "he has a house on Cape Cod"
"she felt she had to get out of the house"

means.word_mean: 2. an official assembly having legislative powers;
3. a building in which something is sheltered or located;
4. a social unit living together;

sentences.sentence: "I waited until the whole house was asleep"
"the teacher asked how many people made up his home"

means.word_mean: 5. a building where theatrical performances or motion-picture shows can be presented;
6. members of a business organization that owns or operates one or more establishments;
7. aristocratic family line;
8. the members of a religious community living together
9. the audience gathered together in a theatre or cinema;
10. play in which children take the roles of father or mother or children and pretend to interact like adults;
11. (astrology) one of 12 equal areas into which the zodiac is divided
12. the management of a gambling house or casino;

sentences.sentence: "the house gets a percentage of every bet"

means.word_mean: 1. contain or cover;
2. provide housing for;

sentences.sentence: "The immigrants were housed in a new development outside the town"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hūs (noun), hūsian (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch huis, German Haus (nouns), and Dutch huizen, German hausen (verbs)

sentences.en: She has moved to a smaller house.

sentences.cn: 人群集中地，也就是基础设施俱全的城市和乡村,通常是适合建造新房屋,工厂和办公楼的场所。
sentences.en: The sensible place to build new houses，factories and offices is where people are，in cities and towns where infrastructure is in place.

sentences.cn: 伦敦地产代理斯特林·阿克罗伊德最近仅在伦敦一地就发现了足够建造50万间房屋的场地，且无须占用任何绿化带。
sentences.en: The London agents Stirling Ackroyd recently identified enough sites for half a million houses in the London area alone，with no intrusion on green belt.

sentences.cn: 问题不是需要建造更多房子，一如既往的，应该在哪里建造这些房屋才是问题的关键。
sentences.en: The issue is not the need for more houses but, as always，where to put them.

sentences.cn: 如果我们知道，自己在选择消费品或房屋时看见笑脸会做出过度反应（这是优秀销售代理和不动产代理总是面带笑容的理由之一），就可以在购买之前等一等。
sentences.en: If we know we will overreact to consumer products or housing options when we see a happy face (one reason good sales representatives and real estate agents are always smiling), we can take a moment before buying.

sentences.cn: 生活在寒冷地区的人类居住在温暖的房屋里，并且学会了适应。
sentences.en: People in cold places live in warm houses and have learned to adapt.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 房屋正面涂着一层混凝土.
sentences.en: The front of the house was faced with concrete.

sentences.cn: 东 、 北墙根尚存房屋断垣,为古代居民住宅.
sentences.en: East, North wall housing the remaining rubble as a reminder for the ancient houses.

sentences.cn: 他们将给新房屋安装电线.
sentences.en: They will wire the new house for electricity.

sentences.cn: 这幢房屋面朝东.
sentences.en: The house fronts east.

sentences.cn: 农户房屋因灾受损程度对于灾后农户的贫困脆弱性起到显著的正向影响.
sentences.en: The damage degrees of houses of rural households take a notable positive effect after the disaster.

sentences.cn: 房屋租赁合同: 这套出租房面积究竟是 多少 ?
sentences.en: Housing rental contracts: the rental housing area is?

sentences.cn: 毕业后, 生活区就变成了在公司和租住的房屋之间.
sentences.en: After graduation , becomes a living area and in between the rented house.

sentences.cn: 如房屋屋顶和墙壁覆盖.
sentences.en: Such as for house roofing and wall covering.

sentences.cn: 这个地区的房屋都是用砂岩建的.
sentences.en: Houses in the area are built of sandstone.

sentences.cn: 人们总是在圣诞节时用冬青来装饰房屋.
sentences.en: People often decorate their houses with holly at Christmas.

sentences.cn: 本法所称房屋,是指土地上的房屋等建筑物及构筑物.
sentences.en: The buildings referred to in this law shall mean houses and other structures on the land.

sentences.cn: 最近你是否清扫过房屋 、 修整过草坪或依偎过小猫?
sentences.en: Did you recently clean the house, mow the lawn or snuggle your new kitten?

sentences.cn: 真正的古老房屋现在已经不多了.
sentences.en: Real old houses are now scarce.

sentences.cn: 这所废弃的房屋中有灯光闪烁.
sentences.en: There was a flicker of lights coming from the abandoned house.

sentences.cn: 他在建造房屋时着眼于建筑之美.
sentences.en: He constructed his house with an eye to architectural beauty.

sentences.cn: 这栋房屋庙宇式的外形,是一位富人的奇想.
sentences.en: The building of this house in the shape of the temple was a rich man's vagary.

sentences.cn: 对你的房屋进行评估, 提高隔热性能.
sentences.en: Weatherize your house, increase insolation , get a energe audit.

sentences.cn: 人无知识犹如房屋没有地基.
sentences.en: A body without knowledge is like a house without a foundation.

sentences.cn: 有两栋独立的房屋.
sentences.en: There are two separate houses.

sentences.cn: 他参加房屋火灾保险.
sentences.en: He took out a fire insurance policy for his house.

sentences.cn: 这场台风吹坏了许多房屋.
sentences.en: The typhoon destroyed many houses.

sentences.cn: 绿色建筑也可以是环保的房屋 、 厂房 、 办公室.
sentences.en: Green building also refer to environmentally friendly houses, factories, and offices.

sentences.cn: 许多房屋被洪水冲毁了.
sentences.en: Many houses were destroyed by the flood.

sentences.cn: 我已投一千万元为我的房屋保火险.
sentences.en: I have insured my house against fire for ten million dollars.

sentences.cn: 房屋是定期用DDT喷洒.
sentences.en: The house is regularly spraying with DDT.

sentences.cn: 安静点，别把全家人都吵醒！
sentences.en: Be quiet or you'll wake the whole house!

sentences.cn: 如果他把闹钟设在午夜响，那会把全家人都吵醒的。
sentences.en: If he set his alarm clock for midnight, it would wake the whole house...

sentences.cn: 全家人都为他的去世感到哀伤.
sentences.en: The whole house was in grief at his death.

sentences.cn: 安静点! 别把全家人都吵醒了.
sentences.en: Be quiet or you'll wake the whole house!

sentences.cn: 你从外面的聚会回来时, 能不能别那么大动静,把全家人都吵醒了!
sentences.en: When you come in from the party, please try not to wake the whole house!

sentences.cn: 那债务沉重地压在我们全家人的身上达一代人之久.
sentences.en: That debt lay heavy on our house for one generation.

sentences.cn: 全家人都患了腮腺炎.
sentences.en: The whole house was ill with mumps.

sentences.cn: 如果他把闹钟设在午夜响，那会把全家人都吵醒的。
sentences.en: If he set his alarm clock for midnight, it would wake the whole house.

sentences.cn: 我在公司里上班。
sentences.en: I work in house (= in the offices of the company that I work for, not at home) .

sentences.cn: 时装公司、银行、出版社等
sentences.en: a fashion/banking/publishing, etc. house

sentences.cn: 有些人认为斯坦普尔的离职将有助于公司解决自身的财务问题。
sentences.en: Some think Stempel's departure will help the company get its financial house in order...

sentences.cn: 这些服装中有很多出自世界顶级时装设计公司。
sentences.en: Many of the clothes come from the world's top fashion houses...

sentences.cn: 讲话者在纽约时装公司工作时使用的材料有什么问题？。
sentences.en: What  was  the  problem  with  the material the speaker worked on at a  New York fashion house?.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 有一年暑假，我到纽约唐人街的一家时装公司实习。
sentences.en: One summer break, I came here to New York for an internship at a fashion house in Chinatown
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 经纪公司或者时尚公司如果聘用身体质量指数低于18 的模特，就会被处以82,000 美元的罚金及最高六个月的监禁。
sentences.en: Agents and fashion houses who hire  models with a BMI under 18 could pay $82,000 in fines  and spend up to 6 months in jail.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 毕业后, 生活区就变成了在公司和租住的房屋之间.
sentences.en: After graduation , becomes a living area and in between the rented house.

sentences.cn: 上课地点可以根据学员的需求确定, 我们可以外派教师到学员所在公司或家中上课.
sentences.en: Location: Accrodding to the student's need, we can sent the teacher to students'office or house.

sentences.cn: 佩德罗: 我在一家摄影器材公司得到一份助理经理的工作.
sentences.en: Pedro: I got a job at a photographic supply house as assistant manager.

sentences.en: My wife is always inviting various waifs and strays from work to our house. She seems to attract them.

sentences.cn: 我们办理业务的人是为公司服务的, 作不了自己的主.
sentences.en: We men of business , who serve a House, are not our own masters.

sentences.cn: 晚上十一点下议院因出席人数不足而休会.
sentences.en: The House was counted out at eleven p.m.

sentences.en: The Clerk of the House prepares the journals of the House.

sentences.cn: 在下议院,最历害的武器就是嘲笑.
sentences.en: In the House of Commons the most devastating weapon is ridicule.

sentences.cn: 1915年的今天,美国众议院(相当于英国的下议院)否决了给予女性投票权的提案.
sentences.en: United States House of Representatives rejects proposal to give women the right to vote.

sentences.cn: 下议院由六百五十八名议员组成.
sentences.en: The house of commons consisted of 658 members.

sentences.en: After a long debate, the House of Commons approved the bill.

sentences.en: The House of Commons shouts him down.

sentences.cn: 下议院仍在开会.

sentences.cn: 下议院有458名议员.
sentences.en: The House of Commons consisted of 658 members.

sentences.en: The House of Commons may do what it like, and so maythe House of Lords.

sentences.cn: 下议院提到了国王的病情.
